monster.prompt: Hi, welcome to the Qave by Qennies™.
Uhh... I’m sorry, how do you even pronounce that?

responseSet.response: It's not "Kwayve" it's "Cave" and it's not "Kwenny's" it's "Kenny's." Yeah, it's pretty weird.
Don't worry about it.
"Qave by Qennies." I literally just said it.

monster.prompt: Ohhh! Ok thank you!
That had me so puzzled as I swam up here.
How rude!
M'kay anyways can I have a Lakebed Shake? YOu guys do sell those, right?
(internal monologue) Looking at the "the customer is always right" sign on the wall,
(internal monologue) I remember my manager threatened to fire me if I ever said no to a customer again.
(internal monologue) Also, looking at this cute monster,
(internal monologue) how could I ever say no to that face?
(internal monologue) Sure, she flooded my restaurant,
(internal monologue) but she also swept away my heart.
(internal monologue) Maybe I just gotta play my cards right...
We definitely do, I just totally lost the recipe!
Could you maybe tell me what goes in it?
Well, I don't know the exact ingredients since I'm just the monster ordering them...
What does it taste like?
It tastes sweet and briny.
I love the combination of vanilla sugar and soggy greens!
I don't head out a lot since the paparazzi nowadays are too intense and I like my privacy,
but when I do eventually go out, I make sure to eat something nice!
Don't tell anyone I'm here, please.

responseSet.response: Oops, I only messaged a couple dozen of my friends...
Hey, my lips are sealed and no one usually comes through here at this time of night.
I don't care enough about fame to tell anyone else.

monster.prompt: Oh thank goodness, it'll be nice to take a break for once.
Ugh... Just make my shake quickly so I can leave.
Do you know enough to make the shake now?
I think I got some of it now, but what is the texture like?
Well, it's a shake so it's obviously creamy, but it's also slimy and slippery.
And it has a nice gritty crunch surprise to it! I love foods with a good crunch to them.
It's been proven that a half a cup of pebbles a day helps with your digestion! A lot of my friends don't believe me...

responseSet.response: I haven't heard of rocks in food before, sounds interesting.
That actually sounds pretty smart, what type of rock do you think is best?
Oof, I'm terrified of how your dental care pans out.

monster.prompt: I recommend the small shiny round ones, if you can get a couple minerals in there that's an extra health boost!
My teeth are perfectly fine, thank you.
Thinking about rocks has made me hungry. Can you get to my shake now?
Almost! I just want to be sure I've got this, what does the shake look like?
Let's see, they're usually light green with swirls of darkern green and a crumbly,
sometimes colorful, topping on top. The swirls remind me of home,
and how I can swim and swirl carefree in cool waters! You haven't had a swim until
you've had a deep water exploration adventure in a lake on a foggy day.
Speaking of, your restaurant is a little shallow for my tastes. This place normally has more water, right?

responseSet.response: This is definitely not the normal amount of water you can find in this establishment.
No. You flooded it.
To be honest, I don't think it is.

monster.prompt: Oh no, that's so sad to hear! I hope you are able to survive the drought.
Thankfully I always bring some spare water with me!
Humph, well don't you have to abide by a handicap access policy?
These flippers weren't made to flop through dirt.
Water is necessary for any all-access place, you should speak to your manager about getting some more.
Well, I think I've got it! One Lakebed Shake coming right up!
Hi, welcome to the Qave by Qennies™.
CERBERUS HAS HAD A LONG DAY GUARDING THE GATES OF HELL.
CERBERUS WOULD LIKE A MOMENT TO DECIDE WHAT CERBERUS WOULD LIKE TO EAT.

responseSet.response: It's all good, dawg.
Sure thing! Take your time.
There's a line forming...

monster.prompt: CERBERUS IS A GOOD DOG, THANK YOU FOR NOTICING. CERBERUS ALSO ENJOYS BEING CALLED A GOOD BOY.
ARE YOU IMPATIENT? CERBERUS THINKS YOU'RE AT THE WRONG KIND OF JOB.
HMM. CERBERUS IS UNSURE OF WHAT TO GET.
CERBERUS DOES KNOW THAT CERBERUS WOULD LIKE A CHILD OF A CHICKEN IN CERBERUS’ FOOD.

responseSet.response: Personally, I think our waffles are pretty good.
Uh...well, our bacon and eggs are pretty alright.
Our hot dogs are kinda bad. Anything but those, really.

monster.prompt: HUMAN, HOW DID YOU KNOW THAT CERBERUS LOVES BACON? YOU MUST BE SUPERNATURAL.
YOU SAID “DOG” AND “BAD" IN THE SAME SENTENCE. YOU THINK CERBERUS IS A BAD DOG, DON’T YOU?
CERBERUS HAS DECIDED THAT CERBERUS WOULD ALSO LIKE MEAT IN CERBERUS’ FOOD.
CERBERUS WOULD LIKE THE DOGHOUSE OMELETTE THANK YOU.

responseSet.response: Cool. Hey, do you always speak in the third person?
I’ll go ahead and fetch that for you, would you like anything else?
Sure thing.

monster.prompt: ARE YOU SUGGESTING CERBERUS PLAYS FETCH WITH YOU? CERBERUS WOULD LOVE THAT!
CERBERUS DOES NOT WISH TO HAVE A CONVERSATION WITH THIS THIRD PERSON, YOU ARE ANNOYING ENOUGH.
CERBERUS WILL BE WAITING PATIENTLY FOR CERBERUS’ DINNER. DON’T FORGET THE BONES.
*cough* Hi, welcome to the *cough* the Qave by Qennies™, what can I get for you today?
D O Y O U H A V E A N Y H U M A N C A R C A S S E S T O D A Y ?

responseSet.response: *cough* No smoking in the restaurant. Also, why would we have carcasses??? Of any kind??
*cough* Not today. Also, our restaurant has a no smoking policy. *cough* *cough* Sorry.
*cough* *cough* Not right now, though could you please town down the smoke? Or we will have one available.

monster.prompt: Oh ha ha sorry! I forget that humans need to breathe air.
I ' L L M A K E Y O U A C A R C A S S
I F Y O U D O N ' T B E C A R E F U L W I T H Y O U R W O R D S Y O U P L E B I A N.
Well, if you don't have any carcasses, then I'll take the Spicy Soul Chilli. You can do that, right?

responseSet.response: Sure. How would you like it?
Yeah sure miss, what's in it again?
That... We should be able to do. Although, it has been a while since I've made it. It has varying ingredients, right?

monster.prompt: It is an older recipe, people use onions now sometimes - so gross.
You don't even know the recipe!? How can you keep this job!?!?
I know some people like it plain, but the weirder the ingredients are the better it is in my opinion.
Though there are limits. Odd vegetables are a yes, but beans...
S H O U L D B E L E F T A L O N E.

responseSet.response: Cool, cool. So I know you asked for human earlier, but since we don't have that, what would you like instead?
Alrighty! What's your protein of choice?
Uh huh, beans beans good for your heart... So ya gonna buy some meats?

monster.prompt: To be honest, it was in jest. Human is technically off of the market these days...
I H A V E N O H E A R T
Cows are good, and sheep, and dog. But only separate. I don't mix my meat.

responseSet.response: Dog huh? Our hot dogs aren't great, I wouldn't have given you one anyways.
That makes sense, anything else you'd like to add?
K. Anything else?

monster.prompt: Hmmmmm, there are a fair bit of ingredients in this but not much more for me.
Even if I liked hot dogs, I woudn't thank you for that.
You know tomatoes don't go in soul chilli, right? It's got a more gooey consistency,
and it S C R E A M S from an aesthetic standpoint.

responseSet.response: Gosh, that's so much, is that all of it?? If so, I'll get that started for you.
Mhmm I'll get that started.
Okay! I'll get that right out for you if that is all?

monster.prompt: Yes it is, thank you for asking.
Y O U ' R E L U C K Y T H A T I T I S Y O U F O O L
I'll be waiting for your return.
